dict.string: #!/usr/bin/env ruby shortcutHash = { " =>" => "\\Rightarrow", " ->" => "\\rightarrow", " <=" => "\\Leftarrow", " <-" => "\\leftarrow", "<=>" => "\\Leftrightarrow" } currentWord=ENV["TM_SELECTED_TEXT"].to_s if (shortcutHash.has_key?(currentWord)) then print shortcutHash[currentWord] else print currentWord end
